official_title: Game on Philly: Engaging Underserved Middle School Youth in Out-of- School Time Sports and Nutrition Education
inclusion_criteria:
Inclusion Criteria (Parents) :

* 18 years of age or older
* Parent or legal guardian of the enrolled child
* Can read, write and speak in English

Inclusion Criteria (Child):

* Interested in and able to participate in the program for 6-months
* Can read, write and speak in English
* Are in 6th, 7th or 8th grade at a participating school
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 9 Years
Must have maximum age of 15 Years
